reviewText: The guy can play but teaches nothing about the songs doesn't break them down at all I've owned some previous videos of curt Mitchell and he at least put tabs with the video to show what he's doing this would probably be the worst video he's made.

Curt Mitchell may be a good guitar player but he can't teach. All he does is play a lick at regular speed and then play it slower. That's it. There is little if any instruction on how to play the lick. This is how all his videos are structured.
